meanings.sent1: The snollygoster tricked everyone with his cunning ways.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a snollygoster in the business world for her deceitful tactics.
meanings.sent3: The snollygoster tried to outsmart his friends in a game of cards.
meanings.sent4: The politician was a true snollygoster, always looking out for his own interests.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the snollygoster who pretends to be your friend but has ulterior motives.

meanings.definition: To behave in a shrewd or unprincipled manner
meanings.sent1: He decided to snollygoster his way through the negotiation, manipulating the facts.
meanings.sent2: She always snollygostered her opponents in debates, making them look foolish.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to snollygoster its way into getting extra treats from its owner.
meanings.sent4: The fox snollygostered its way into the henhouse, outsmarting the farmer.
meanings.sent5: The con artist was skilled at snollygostering people out of their money with false promises.
